descriptionlist.description:
Installed to the iWidgets directory: /var/mobile/Library/iWidgets

Tweaks that you can use with:
iWidgets or XenHTML

Widget size info:

For iphone 5/5s users, replace the "Widget.plist" with "Widget(i5).plist" file. This applies only for iWidgets tweak users.

Got questions? Contact me on:
Twitter: @Classicxii
Email: classicxii42@gmail.com

changelog.change:
Music player only has been added as an option

White mode has been added as an option

Auto Size has been added and fix chinese text being cut off.
